caption.text:
Blueberry Thyme Pisco
-
60 ml pisco Cuatro G'S Mosto Verde Acholado
1/2 teaspoon honey
2 sprigs fresh thyme
10 fresh blueberries
120 ml tonic water
Crushed ice
Extra blueberries
Thyme sprigs for garnish
-
1) In a cocktail shaker muddle the blueberries, honey and 2 thyme sprigs. f you have a few minutes to spare, allow the muddle to marinade to develop a stronger thyme flavour 2)¬†Add pisco to a cocktail shaker half filled with crushed ice then shake 3) Pour, don‚Äôt strain, the cocktail into a glass half filled with more crushed ice and top with tonic water
-
Spotted on @thepiscopeople
-
Tag a friend you would love to share this delicious drink with!
-
